entry.def: An eyewitness is a person who was present at an event and can therefore describe it, for example in a law court.

example.ex: Eyewitnesses say the police then opened fire on the crowd.
example.tran: 目击者称警察随后向人群开火。
目击者对战斗惊心动魄的描述

Sentence.sentence: Many factors influence the accuracy of eyewitness testimony.
The two women in this case were eyewitnesses.
